CSS_scope.summary: The _scope CSS at-rule enables you to select elements in specific DOM subtrees, targeting elements precisely without writing overly-specific selectors that are hard to override, and without coupling your selectors too tightly to the DOM structure.

remarks.para: In JavaScript, _scope can be accessed via the CSS object model interface .
